text: 6.34: Nam 27.17; 1 Kin 22.17; 2 Sto 18.16; Ese 34.5; Mt 9.36Mbe vov phorgav, Zisas mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve garim, mbe guigira vhɨrkɨvgi. Ana mbe gangiap, guigira mbe kora muuŋgi. Ana mbe garim, mbe sipsivi fara muuŋgi, mbe vuavi ki fhu, mbe fhura bogbogɨ rui. Ana mbe gangia thav, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ vhɨrver mbe nzuai.
